attributes.action: Instruct Sky to reinstate the channels (Sky One etc.) withdrawn from Virgin Media until a deal can be reached
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price dispute between Virgin Media and Sky should not be allowed to affect the customers of Virgin Media or cause needless environmental impact (unnecessary journeys by engineers & renewing electrical equipment to convert customers from cable to SKY).

Sky should be forced to provide the channels to Virgin Media either at the previous contract rate or at no cost. 

This would be subject to the understanding that when a new contract is agreed between the two parties (either voluntary or through intervention from OFCOM) that Virgin Media would be liable for the difference between the amount paid and the new rate (backdated to the end of the previous contract).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
